basics.name: Waseem Ali Sabeel
basics.label: Salesforce Specialist
basics.pictureComment: The image path is from current hosted github repository. Third party URLs are blocked by CSP
basics.summary: 20x Certified Salesforce Professional with extensive consulting experience as a Salesforce Solution Designer with a knack for designing, developing and delivering quality solutions on Salesforce Platform. 7+ Years of Work Experience. The go-to person to define and refine architecture. The go-to builder for most pressing Salesforce implementation projects. Capable to flawlessly communicate with technical and non-technical Client stakeholders. Proficient in App development, passionate Trainer and Mentor, and a certified Application & System Architect going onward and upward!

references.name: Jane Doe
references.title: President, Universal Containers
references.reference: I've had the great pleasure of working with Waseem for the past three years at Deloitte, and on a few side projects. He has been with our projects through thick and thin. He is a phenomenal salesforce developer and a true team player. Highly recommended!

references.name: John Doe
references.title: CTO, Universal Containers
references.reference: Hire this Guy ! Incredibly capable and fast. Plays well with others. Unbelievable at Salesforce customizations. Visionary. Hire him before I do.
